public class Primenumber {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
           
		int givendata=4;
		int count =0;
		if(givendata>0) {
			for (int i=1;i<=givendata;i++) {
				if(givendata%i==0) {
					count++;
				}
			}
			if(count==2) {
				System.out.println("prime number ");
			}
			else {
				System.out.println("not a prime number ");
			}
		}
}
}
